title: Digitised Certificate of Origin
description: アフリカから商品を輸出するプロジェクトの多くは、原産地証明書がないために失敗します。

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal presented a real world problem  of manufactured product origin and offered a solution but failed to give further details on how the solution will be implemented .
Considering the lack of details , i neither Agree nor disagree.
f6_assessments.q2:
No audit information provided.
i Strongly disagree.

f6_assessments.q0: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for impact assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for feasibility assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for auditability assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: This idea has a lot of potentiel. Certificate of origine is a good idea but the proposer doesn't elaborate on this. I hope that the proposer will refine this idea and come up with a clear solution in the next funds.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal does not have any details about implementation. The whole proposal is just an idea.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal is not complete. The whole proposal is just an idea

solution: 商品を輸出したい中小企業が原産地証明書を取得できるように、カルダノブロックチェーンベースのソリューションを開発する。
experience: 20年以上にわたるIT業界での専門知識
